name: Snap (Infirmarian)
description:
I thought this was supposed to be a vacation...

You're traveling in the woods in an RV, trying to enjoy a break. However, your eccentric grandfather has different ideas. Talking to you through a two-way radio, he gives you instructions to go out and gather evidence of a so-called 'conspiracy'. Using the camera your grandpa 'so generously loaned you', you explore a large map, snapping pictures.

Hopefully grandpa doesn't make me do anything too dangerous...
